content:
Also, Russia’s expanded Middle East role and the soldier poets of Guinea-Bissau

THE MILITARY junta that runs Thailand almost managed to sew up a momentous election. Some last-minute meddling keeps the generals in charge, but their government will be weak and a surging youth-led party will nip at their heels. Also, as Russia intensifies bombings in Idlib, the last stronghold of Syrian rebels, we examine how Russia’s involvement in Syria has expanded its role in the Middle East. And we visit the soldier-poets of Guinea-Bissau. Runtime: 21min

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 比绍；【城】比绍
网络 比索；及内比亚绍；几内亚

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
n. 创伤
网络 后果；余波；结果
eg2: A lot of rebuilding took place in the aftermath of the war.
战后进行了大量的重建工作。
the assassination of the Prime Minister and its immediate aftermath
暗杀首相及其直接后果

ex: n. 足跟；脚后跟；（袜子等的）后跟；（鞋、靴子等的）后跟
v. 给（鞋等）修理后跟；倾侧；倾斜
网络 脚跟；踵；鞋跟
eg2: shoes with a low/high heel
低跟鞋；高跟鞋
a stiletto heel
细高跟
The sergeant clicked his heels and walked out.
中士将鞋跟咔哒一并，走了出去。
high-heeled shoes
高跟鞋
She doesn't often wear heels.
她不常穿高跟鞋。
He fled from the stadium with the police at his heels.
他逃离了运动场，警察在后面紧追不舍。
He fled from the stadium with the police at his heels.
他逃离了运动场，警察在后面紧追不舍。
News of rising unemployment followed hard on the heels of falling export figures.
出口数字下降之后紧接着就是失业率上升的消息。
News of rising unemployment followed hard on the heels of falling export figures.
出口数字下降之后紧接着就是失业率上升的消息。
The boat heeled over in the strong wind.
船在狂风中倾侧了。

ex: vi. 增强，强化；变激烈
vt. 使加强，使强化；使变激烈
eg2: WHO calls on all its Member States to  action against cancer by developing and reinforcing cancer control programmes.
世卫组织呼吁其所有会员国通过制定和加强癌症控制规划强化防治癌症的行动。
These stories take ideas, feelings, and fears that humans share and  and heighten them, he said in an interview with Psychiatric News.
在接受《精神病学新闻》采访时，他表示这些故事所反映的思想、感情和害怕是人们共有的、不断强化着的。
Officials say they will intensify health screening measures at airports and ports.
官员说，他们将加强在机场和港口的健康检查措施。

ex: vi. 管闲事，干预他人之事
eg2: I no longer had to  with her.
我与她不再有什么瓜葛了。
You know, like I said, I don't want to .
你知道的，就像我之前说的，我不想插手这件事。
But the program requires the support of pork producers.And they "have to date been reluctant to support what many see as a bid by government to  in their affairs," Branswell says.
但是这个项目需要猪肉厂商的支持，而就像作者所说，“现在，他们需要不情愿的支持一个让政府插手他们事务的项目。”

ex: adj. 重要的；重大的
eg2: This is a momentous development, for two reasons.
这是一个重大的发展，原因有二。
And this is a really momentous occasion because we’re celebrating the 50th Anniversary of the Peace Corps and you are part of that 50th Anniversary group.
这是一个十分重要的时刻，因为我们正在庆祝和平队成立50周年，而你们是在和平队庆祝50周年之际加入的成员。
So this is a  day in the history of Libya.
所以，这是利比亚历史上的重大一天。

ex: vt. 夹；捏；剪断；冻伤；阻止
vi. 夹；捏；刺骨；小饮
n. 夹；捏；刺骨；小饮
n. (Nip)人名；(中)聂(广东话·威妥玛)
eg2: it in the bud.
把它消灭在萌芽状态。
If you barely have enough time for the friends you have now, be wary of taking on someone you haven’t missed that much and  this encounter in the bud — nicely, of course.
如果你的时间刚好只能贡献给你现在的朋友，在重逢那些交情浅的朋友时要小心，把这样的巧遇要“扼杀在摇篮里”——当然，是友善地。
She once walked into a reception for a Japanese prince with the words, " on!
她曾经在出席欢迎日本亲王的招待会时说过“日本佬！ 日本佬！”

ex: n. 反政府的人；叛乱者；造反者；反抗权威者
v. 造反；反抗；背叛
adj. 造反的
网络 反叛；反叛者；叛逆者
eg2: rebel forces
叛乱武装
Armed rebels advanced towards the capital.
武装叛乱分子向首都推进。
I've always been the rebel of the family.
我在家里向来是个叛逆者。
He later rebelled against his strict religious upbringing.
他后来背叛了他所受的严格的宗教教育。
Most teenagers find something to rebel against.
大多数青少年都有反抗意识。

ex: v. 缝；缝制；缝补；做针线活
网络 缝纫；缝合；搜索引擎观察(Search Engine Watch)
eg2: My mother taught me how to sew.
我母亲教我做针线。
to sew by hand/machine
手工／机器缝制
to sew a seam
缝接缝
She sews all her own clothes.
她所有的衣服都是自己缝的。
Can you sew a button on for me?
你能给我钉个扣子吗？
Surgeons were able to sew the finger back on.
外科医生把断指接上了。

ex: n. 假装；骗子；赝品
vt. 假装；冒充
vi. 假装；佯装
adj. 假的；虚假的；假装的
n. (Sham)人名；(英、印、毛里塔)沙姆

wp.sham surgery: 假手术;假手术组;随机分为假手术组
wp.sham plea: 虚伪的申述;虚伪的答辩

eg2: "Excuse me," I mutter. "I have to get this  over with.
“对不起，”我咕哝着说，“我得把假装的这一套做完了事。”
Both real and sham acupuncture worked better than having no treatment at all.
真实的和虚假的针刺两者都比完全没有治疗的作用要好。
I can only hope that this will spread like wildfire and the disinformation campaign being run by BP as well as our own federal government is exposed for the  it is.
我仅希望这个采访可以像野火一样蔓延并且曝光由英国石油公司 和我们的联邦政府操作的虚假信息活动正如他们本身一样都是骗子。

ex: n. 要塞；据点；堡垒；有广泛支持的地方
网络 根据地；要塞据点；大本营
eg2: a Republican stronghold/a stronghold of Republicanism
共和党势力强大的地区
This valley is one of the last strongholds of the Siberian tiger.
这条山谷是西伯利亚虎最后的几个主要栖息地之一。

eg2: But for some people merely imagining this scene creates an adrenaline .
但是对于某些人但是想象这一幕就会肾上腺素激增。

Title: “The region can no longer look to Thailand to be a guiding light”—the aftermath of a sham election
